text: Reginald Norman Morgan Empey, Baron Empey, (born 26 October 1947), best known as Reg Empey, is a Unionist politician from Northern Ireland. He was the leader of the Ulster Unionist Party (UUP) from 2005 to 2010. He was the chairman of the Ulster Unionist Party from 2012 to 2019. Empey was also Lord Mayor of Belfast and was a Member of the Northern Ireland Assembly (MLA) for East Belfast from 1998 to 2011. ==References== Category:1947 births Category:Living people Category:First Ministers of Northern Ireland Category:Politicians from Belfast Category:Ulster Unionist members of the Northern Ireland Assembly Category:Conservative Life Peers
title: Reg Empey
